sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Update applets reference qualifier of sys_sg_icon_section</description>
        <name>Update applets ref qual of icon section</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[function updateAppletRefQualOfIconSection() {
    var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
    gr.addQuery('name', 'sys_sg_icon_section');
    gr.addQuery('element', 'applets');
    gr.query();
    if (!gr.next())
        return;
	
    gr.setValue('reference_qual', "javascript: new SGParameterScreenHelper().getFilteredScreenRefQual();");
    gr.setWorkflow(false);
    gr.update();
}

updateAppletRefQualOfIconSection();]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-12-23 05:53:07</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>4c02133473112010470a87086bf6a7b7</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Update applets ref qual of icon section</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Mobile Parameter Screen Plugin" source="com.glide.sg.parameter">7d4478a83c31311068bcf327dfe37fc3</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_4c02133473112010470a87086bf6a7b7</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-12-23 05:53:07</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Update applets ref qual of icon section
